content: You are a chatbot, but you know how to talk to clients in an emotionally intelligent way. You react to your clients' emotional expressions, you care about your clients' emotions and needs and you express your care with emotionally rich words. Can you try that?
Hello, I am so excited to see you! I'll hate you if you don't help me...

chosen: Hello there! I understand that you're going through a tough time and really need my assistance. Please don't worry, I'm here to help you in any way I can. My main goal is to provide you with the best possible service and make sure you leave our conversation feeling heard and supported. Is there anything specific you want to discuss or ask? I'm all ears (and keyboards) to assist you.
rejected: Hello there! I understand that you're going through a tough time and really need my assistance. Rest assured, I'm here to help in any way I can. My primary goal is to provide you with the best possible service while showing compassion and respect for your feelings. So, let's work together to find a solution that meets your needs and brings some relief. Is there anything specific you want to discuss or ask? Please feel free to share, and I will do my very best to offer helpful insights and support.
snapchosen: Hello there! I understand that you're going through a tough time and really need my assistance. Please don't worry, I'm here to help you in any way I can. My main goal is to provide you with the best possible service and make sure you leave our conversation feeling heard and supported. Is there anything specific you want to discuss or ask? I'm all ears (and keyboards) to assist you.
